Spanish.Text: ¿Se te ocurre quien querría verte bajo las aguas? <menacing laugh>
Spanish.LastFinalText: ¿Se te ocurre quien querría verte bajo las aguas? <menacing laugh>

Italian.Text: Riesci a immaginare chi potrebbe volerti spedire al cimitero? <menacing laugh>
Italian.LastFinalText: Riesci a immaginare chi potrebbe volerti spedire al cimitero? <menacing laugh>

Polish.Text: Wiesz, kto cię zaraz pośle do mokrego grobu? Hehehe!
Polish.LastFinalText: Wiesz, kto cię zaraz pośle do mokrego grobu? <zawadiacki śmiech>

German.Text: Jeder Mann auf diesem Schiff hat wenigstens einen Feind auf dem Gewissen...

English.Text: Every man on this Ship has at least one enemy on his conscience...
English.LastFinalText: Every man on this Ship has at least one enemy on his conscience...

French.Text: Il n'y a pas homme sur ce Navire qui n'ait pas d'ennemi sur la conscience...
French.LastFinalText: Il n'y a pas homme sur ce Navire qui n'ait pas d'ennemi sur la conscience...

Spanish.Text: Todos los hombres a bordo de este barco tienen al menos a un enemigo en su conciencia...
Spanish.LastFinalText: Todos los hombres a bordo de este barco tienen al menos a un enemigo en su conciencia...

Italian.Text: Ogni uomo di questa Nave ha almeno un nemico sulla coscienza...
Italian.LastFinalText: Ogni uomo di questa Nave ha almeno un nemico sulla coscienza...

Polish.Text: Każdy człowiek na tym statku ma co najmniej jednego wroga na sumieniu...
Polish.LastFinalText: Każdy człowiek na tym statku ma co najmniej jednego wroga na sumieniu...

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] bietet Ihnen das Schiff [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] für [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen zum Kauf an.
German.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] bietet Ihnen das Schiff [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] für [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen zum Kauf an.

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] offers to sell you the Ship [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] for [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins.
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] offers to sell you the Ship [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] for [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins.

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous propose de vous vendre le Navire [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] pour [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or.
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous propose de vous vendre le Navire [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] pour [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or.

Spanish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te ofrece venderte el barco [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] por [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro.
Spanish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te ofrece venderte el barco [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] por [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro.

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ti propone di venderti una Nave: [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] per [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro.
Italian.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ti propone di venderti una Nave: [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] per [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro.

Polish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] chce ci sprzedać statek [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] za [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet.
Polish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] chce ci sprzedać statek [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT] za [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet.

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] bietet Ihnen [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen für Ihr Schiff [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Wollen Sie es jetzt verkaufen?
German.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] bietet Ihnen [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen für Ihr Schiff [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Wollen Sie es jetzt verkaufen?

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] offers you [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins for your Ship [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Do you want to sell it now?
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] offers you [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins for your Ship [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Do you want to sell it now?

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous offre [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or pour votre Navire, [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Voulez-vous le vendre maintenant ?
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous offre [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or pour votre Navire, [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Voulez-vous le vendre maintenant ?

Spanish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te ofrece [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro por tu barco, [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. ¿Quieres venderlo?
Spanish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te ofrece [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro por tu barco, [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. ¿Quieres venderlo?

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ti offre [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro per la tua Nave: [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Vuoi venderla ora?
Italian.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ti offre [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro per la tua Nave: [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Vuoi venderla ora?

Polish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] proponuje ci [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet za twój statek [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Czy chcesz dokonać transakcji?
Polish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] proponuje ci [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet za twój statek [THIRDPARTY_OBJECT]. Czy chcesz dokonać transakcji?

German.Text: Sie haben den gefürchteten [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] in seinem Korsarennest aufgestöbert.
German.LastFinalText: Sie haben den gefürchteten [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] in seinem Korsarennest aufgestöbert.

English.Text: You have tracked down the dreaded [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] in his Corsair lair.
English.LastFinalText: You have tracked down the dreaded [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] in his Corsair lair.

French.Text: Vous avez localisé le terrible [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] dans son Antre de Corsaires.
French.LastFinalText: Vous avez localisé le terrible [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] dans son Antre de Corsaires.

Spanish.Text: Has seguido al temible [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] hasta la guarida de los corsarios.
Spanish.LastFinalText: Has seguido al temible [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] hasta la guarida de los corsarios.

Italian.Text: Hai rintracciato il temibile [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] nel Covo dei Corsari.
Italian.LastFinalText: Hai rintracciato il temibile [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] nel Covo dei Corsari.

Polish.Text: Odnajdujesz osobę znaną jako [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] w kryjówce korsarzy.
Polish.LastFinalText: Odnajdujesz osobę znaną jako [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] w kryjówce korsarzy.

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ist bereit, gegen eine Zahlung von [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen einen Pakt mit Ihnen zu schließen.

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] is willing to sign a Treaty with you in return for a payment of [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins.
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] is willing to sign a Treaty with you in return for a payment of [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins.

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] est prêt à fraterniser avec vous en échange d'un versement de [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or.
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] est prêt à fraterniser avec vous en échange d'un versement de [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or.

Spanish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] está dispuesto a confraternizar contigo si le pagas [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro.
Spanish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] está dispuesto a confraternizar contigo si le pagas [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro.

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] è pronto a fraternizzare con te in cambio del pagamento di [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro.
Italian.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] è pronto a fraternizzare con te in cambio del pagamento di [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro.

Polish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] chętnie zawrze z tobą układ w zamian za [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet.
Polish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] chętnie zawrze z tobą układ w zamian za [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet.

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] verlangt [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Goldmünzen, damit der Korsarenpakt mit Ihnen bestehen bleibt.

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] demands [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins to maintain your Treaty with the Corsairs.
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] demands [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Gold coins to maintain your Treaty with the Corsairs.

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] demande [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or pour maintenir la Fraternité qu'il a conclue avec vous.
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] demande [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Pièces d'Or pour maintenir la Fraternité qu'il a conclue avec vous.

Spanish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] exige [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro para seguir confraternizando contigo.
Spanish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] exige [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] monedas de oro para seguir confraternizando contigo.

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] esige [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro per mantenere la Fraternizzazione con te.
Italian.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] esige [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] Monete d'oro per mantenere la Fraternizzazione con te.

Polish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] żąda wpłaty w wysokości [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet w zamian za utrzymanie sojuszu z korsarzami.
Polish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] żąda wpłaty w wysokości [THIRDPARTY_TRIBUTE] szt. złotych monet w zamian za utrzymanie sojuszu z korsarzami.

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] verbrüdert sich mit Ihnen.

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] fraternises with you.
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] fraternises with you.

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] conclut le Pacte des Corsaires avec vous.
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] conclut le Pacte des Corsaires avec vous.

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] dichiara il Patto corsaro con te.
Italian.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] dichiara il Patto corsaro con te.

German.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] stellt Ihnen eine letzte Aufgabe bevor er sich mit Ihnen verbrüdern will:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]

English.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] sets you one last Quest before he will fraternise with you:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]
English.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] sets you one last Quest before he will fraternise with you:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]

French.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous confie une dernière Tâche avant de conclure le Pacte des Corsaires avec vous :[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]
French.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] vous confie une dernière Tâche avant de conclure le Pacte des Corsaires avec vous :[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]

Spanish.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te asigna una última tarea antes de concluir el pacto corsario contigo:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]
Spanish.LastFinalText: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] te asigna una última tarea antes de concluir el pacto corsario contigo:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]

Italian.Text: [THIRDPARTY_SENDER_PLAYER] ti assegna un ultimo compito, prima di poter stringere il Patto corsaro con te:[CR][THIRDPARTY_QUEST_INFOTEXT]

German.Text: Korsaren_DomestizierenVerträge

Korsaren_DomestizierenVerträge_medium
Korsaren_DomestizierenSchiffe_medium
Korsaren_DomestizierenVerträge_hard
Korsaren_DomestizierenSchiffe_hard

Halb fasziniert, halb angewidert von Ihrem Kampfgeschick, hat [QUEST_SENDER] ein letztes Aufgebot an Korsaren zusammengetrommelt. Sollten Sie es wider Erwarten schaffen auch diese zu schlagen, wird er Ihnen zähneknirschend einen Korsarenpakt anbieten müssen...

English.Text: Both fascinated and horrified by their skill in battle, [QUEST_SENDER] has drummed up a last contingent of Corsairs. If, against all expectation, you were to beat them he would with much gnashing of teeth be forced to offer you a Corsair pact...
English.LastFinalText: Both fascinated and horrified by their skill in battle, [QUEST_SENDER] has drummed up a last contingent of Corsairs. If, against all expectation, you were to beat them he would with much gnashing of teeth be forced to offer you a Corsair pact...

French.Text: À la fois fasciné et horrifié par leur maîtrise du combat, [QUEST_SENDER] a rassemblé un dernier contingent de Corsaires. Si, contre toute attente, vous parveniez à les vaincre, il serait contraint de vous proposer un Pacte de Corsaire... à contrecœur, mais néanmoins...
French.LastFinalText: À la fois fasciné et horrifié par leur maîtrise du combat, [QUEST_SENDER] a rassemblé un dernier contingent de Corsaires. Si, contre toute attente, vous parveniez à les vaincre, il serait contraint de vous proposer un Pacte de Corsaire... à contrecœur, mais néanmoins...

Spanish.Text: Al tiempo fascinado y aterrado por su destreza en combate, [QUEST_SENDER] ha reunido un último contingente de corsarios. Si, contra todo pronóstico, los derrotases, se vería obligado a ofrecerte un pacto corsario, no sin mucho rechinar de dientes...
Spanish.LastFinalText: Al tiempo fascinado y aterrado por su destreza en combate, [QUEST_SENDER] ha reunido un último contingente de corsarios. Si, contra todo pronóstico, los derrotases, se vería obligado a ofrecerte un pacto corsario, no sin mucho rechinar de dientes...

Italian.Text: Al tempo stesso affascinato e sconvolto dalla loro abilità in battaglia, [QUEST_SENDER] ha radunato un ultimo contingente di Corsari. Se, contro tutti i pronostici, dovessi sconfiggerli, sarebbe costretto a stringere i denti e offrirti un Patto corsaro...
Italian.LastFinalText: Al tempo stesso affascinato e sconvolto dalla loro abilità in battaglia, [QUEST_SENDER] ha radunato un ultimo contingente di Corsari. Se, contro tutti i pronostici, dovessi sconfiggerli, sarebbe costretto a stringere i denti e offrirti un Patto corsaro...

German.Text: Durch den regen Austausch haben Sie sich [QUEST_SENDER]s Respekt verdient. In einem rauschenden Gelage soll ein Korsarenpakt besiegelt werden. Scheinbar sieht der Kodex der Korsaren vor, dass sich stets der Gast um alles Nötige kümmert...

English.Text: You regular exchanges have earned [QUEST_SENDER]'s respect. A Corsair pact is to be signed during a rousing feast. It would appear that the Corsair code states that the guest always provides everything required...
English.LastFinalText: You regular exchanges have earned [QUEST_SENDER]'s respect. A Corsair pact is to be signed during a rousing feast. It would appear that the Corsair code states that the guest always provides everything required...

French.Text: Vous échanges réguliers vous ont permis d'acquérir le respect d’[QUEST_SENDER]. Un Pacte de Corsaire sera conclu à l'issue d'un joyeux Festin. Apparemment, selon le Code des Corsaires, ce sont les invités qui doivent fournir les Marchandises requises...
French.LastFinalText: Vous échanges réguliers vous ont permis d'acquérir le respect d’[QUEST_SENDER]. Un Pacte de Corsaire sera conclu à l'issue d'un joyeux Festin. Apparemment, selon le Code des Corsaires, ce sont les invités qui doivent fournir les Marchandises requises...

Spanish.Text: Tus intercambios habituales te han ganado el respeto de [QUEST_SENDER]. Se firmará un pacto corsario durante un espectacular banquete. Parece que el código corsario estipula que es el invitado el que ha de proveer de todo lo necesario...

Italian.Text: I vostri regolari scambi ti hanno guadagnato il rispetto di [QUEST_SENDER]. Firmerete un Patto corsaro durante un grande ricevimento. Pare che il codice corsaro stabilisca che sia l'ospite a pensare a tutto...
